settings.title: Floré Adult | Personalized Probiotics & Gut Microbiome Test Program
settings.subheadlineTwo: START WITH THE GUT TEST FOR ONLY $79
settings.DecriptionArea:
What is Floré?

Truly custom formulated probiotics based on a Complete Gut Microflora Test. Instead of recommending multiple supplements, we analyze the trillions of microbes in your gut microflora, and craft a unique formula for your unique gut health needs. Our formulas are designed so you only have to take one-pill-a-day and we cold ship it directly to your door.

How does it help?

Floré personalized probiotics help with abdominal pain, constipation, bloating, SIBO, leaky gut, and other digestive issues. They are 100% natural, vegan (optional), gluten-free, non-GMO, and are formulated without artificial preservatives.

settings.heading: Free Retesting
settings.description: Free retesting every 4 months on the probiotics to track your improvement and how your gut makeup has changed.

settings.detailsText: 81% of customers reported improvement in immunity

settings.heading: See What Everyone is Saying
settings.poweredby: POWERED BY

settings.subheadline_data_accordion: The microbiome is the collection of all the microbes and their corresponding set of genes. Sun Genomics focuses on the microbiome located in the gut. A common misconception is that all these microbes are bad for you, but that is not true; microbes play an integral role in aiding the body's immunological, nutritional, and metabolic functions.

settings.subheadline_accordion: When can I expect to see results?
settings.subheadline_data_accordion: It's important to note that every person is different in both their gut profile as well as their reaction to probiotics. Therefore everyone's results and reaction time is a variable that we cannot predict. What we can predict is that your overall health will improve.

settings.subheadline_accordion: How often will I be charged and when do I get my shipments?
settings.subheadline_data_accordion: Floré is a monthly plan. First month starts off with the Gut Health Test kit and every subsequent month you receive your custom probiotics. You can manage your monthly auto renew through Account Management. You will receive the information via email.

Your microbiome is always subject to change: if you take antibiotics, have a severe illness, or even change your diet, your gut microbiome may change. We provide you monthly probiotics and you can opt to re-test every five months.
